roleset.name: lend aid, credence to
roleset.note: SUPPORT-V NOTES: 'support' based on big corpus, comparison with 'help'; 'supportive' based on BOLT-1. Member of Vncls admire-31.2, contiguous_location-47.8, help-72. (from support.01-v)
SUPPORT-N NOTES: Roleset based on support.01. Verbnet class admire 31.2. Framed by Katie (from support.01-n)
SUPPORTIVE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from supportive.01-j)

role.descr: person, thing or project being supported

example.name: benefactive
example.text: The finding probably will support those who argue that the US should regulate the class of asbestos including crocidolite more closely.
example.arg: those who argue that the US should regulate the class of asbestos including crocidolite more closely.

example.name: adjectival rel: supportive
example.text: Credit growth was supportive of continued recovery in Q1.

example.name: awkward sentence
example.text: The party's base support, liberal woman's groups, civil rights groups, environmental groups, the foot that raises money knock on doors and vote come rain or shine, want to fight over Alito.
